entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Terrace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:19 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Airport 09:29 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:23 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
